content:
The professors at the Academia always say,

As a scholar,

You must always approach every conclusion with skepticism.

And the starlight on my tail
seems to be particularly attractive to them.
What a troublesome relationship, so mysterious, yeep~

Just as I thought, the beach was submerged earlier.

But world bubbles have all sorts of unique characteristics,

So I couldn't be completely sure what was really going on before.

You seem to be having a blast catching shellfish.
Unfortunately, I don't dare go down there.
Lobster claws are the natural enemy of my tail.
